thread.title: Watch Kodak Black Give a Tour of His New Crib
thread.title_full: Watch Kodak Black Give a Tour of His New Crib

author: Jake Boyer
title: Watch Kodak Black Give a Tour of His New Crib
text:
What do you do when you get released from prison and you have a boat load of money burning a hole in your pocket? Obviously you buy yourself a fancy-as-hell crib to crash in. At least that was Kodak Black’s thinking, and since modesty isn’t one of his natural attributes, he has taken to Instagram to show us humble peasants what his new ultra-swanky bachelor pad looks like. Take a peek below.
The #NewHoneyComb 
A video posted by Project Baby (@kodakblack) on Jan 5, 2017 at 12:18pm PST 

@johnwicks1k We Playing Golf Now ⛳️ 
A video posted by Project Baby (@kodakblack) on Jan 5, 2017 at 12:20pm PST 

And being the sophisticated 19-year-old that he is, Kodak Black’s new home features such amenities as a private golf course for all his business deals and a television in the bathroom for all his Netflix-and-dump needs. He may be young, but he is living the ex-con dream.
Watch the video for Kodak Black’s first single post-prison, “There He Go,” below.

In other music news, Donald Glover gave a surprising (and hilarious) shout out to a certain rap trio during his Golden Globes acceptance speech. See what he had to say right here .
